title: 31: Six messaging apps before lunch, with Matthew Panzarino
description: When did Apple know it had to change gears on Mac Pro, and will it have a similar moment of clarity with iMessage and making it multi-platform? Matthew Panzarino of TechCrunch joins Gartenberg and Ritchie for our first, regular, second-guessing show.
itunes:author: Michael Gartenberg, Rene Ritchie, Matthew Panzarino
itunes:subtitle: When did Apple know it had to change gears on Mac Pro, and will it have a similar moment of clarity with iMessage and making it multi-platform? Matthew Panzarino of TechCrunch joins Gartenberg and Ritchie for our first, regular, second-guessing show.
